text: This is our commitment to users and the people who use our service, is that Facebook's a free service. It's free now. It will always be free. We make money through having advertisements and things like that.
author: Mark Zuckerberg

text: Is it not odd that the only generous person I ever knew, who had money to be generous with, should be a stockbroker.
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

text: A development deal is where they're giving you recording time and money to record, but not promising that they'll put an album out.
author: Taylor Swift

text: I'm tired of love I'm still more tired of rhyme but money gives me pleasure all the time.
author: Hilaire Belloc

text: Money is the root of all evil, and yet it is such a useful root that we cannot get on without it any more than we can without potatoes.
author: Louisa May Alcott
